## Augment

This document takes care of the augment of the data. 
In the following the data will be log2 transformed.

## Load data

Load the clean data.
```{r}
#| label: load data
clean_data <- read_tsv(file = "../data/02_dat_clean")

```

## Transformation

In the following the data will be log2 transformed.

```{r}
#| label: log-transformation

augment_data = count_data |>
  mutate_at(vars(starts_with("ILMN")), log2)

```
